body.p:
offers an add-on that contributes actions in the Tools menu and contextual menu of the resources in the Project view, actions that allow for batch conversions between various formats:
HTML to XHTML
HTML to DITA
Markdown to XHTML
Markdown to DITA
XML to JSON
JSON to XML
HTML to DocBook4 ( 20 or newer)
HTML to DocBook5 ( 20 or newer)
Markdown to DocBook4 ( 20 or newer)
Markdown to DocBook5 ( 20 or newer)
Excel to DITA
Word to XHTML
Word to DITA
Word to DocBook4 ( 20 or newer)
Word to DocBook5 ( 20 or newer)

To install the add-on, select Batch Converter... from the Tools menu, and then restart . A Batch Converter submenu will now be available in the Tools menu and in the contextual menu of the Project view. This submenu will contain the list of available conversions. Selecting an action from the submenu will open a dialog box where you can configure the options for the corresponding conversion.
For more information, see the details for this Batch Converter add-on in GitHub.
